title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 2
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 2
description:
Underdogs howled last week, but now it's time for Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter to settle on their Faves Five picks of the week. Together they narrow down their betting card, and select a Big Balls Bet of the Week,  play a round of Scooch Roulette, and dive into all their favorite picks for a loaded Week 2 slate. Plus, we here some love for the lowly Jets, the plucky Saints and hear about recent calls from Simon's fellow professional gamblers. #Herd #ColinCowherd

#Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
